snippet: The Nascar driver Trevor Bayne, 22, said that he had multiple sclerosis but that he did not expect it to affect his racing career.
abstract: Nascar driver Trevor Bayne, 22, says he has multiple sclerosis but does not expect condition to affect his racing career.
lead_paragraph: The Nascar driver Trevor Bayne, 22, said that he had multiple sclerosis but that he did not expect it to affect his racing career.
